title: A+ Rank(Part 2)
body:
A+ Rank(Part 2)

Evan stopped absorbing the bodies of the monsters when he received Kazil's message. A small smile appeared on his face as he looked at the progress of his prime core.

"Twenty-five percent in two hours, huh," Evan said to himself after seeing the progress of his prime core, "At this rate, it wouldn't be impossible for me to reach A+ rank before meeting Sebastian tomorrow."

After confirming the rank of his core, Evan used his shadow senses and connected his vision with Kazil.

When Evan connected his vision with Kazil, the plane was landing at the airport of Naphliam City.

Because Kazil was sitting on the roof of the plane, Evan could see thousands of monsters that were rampaging inside the city.

The airport was still fine because many hunters were protecting the landing field.

After the plane landed, Evan ordered Kazil to stay hidden and follow Sophie, Mark, Caleb and David.
